document_data.name: Lone Wolf
document_data.mainbody: '''Lone wolves''' were [[specialty priest]]s devoted to [[Fenmarel Mestarine]], the Lone Wolf.
document_data.Culture: Lone wolves were [[elves]] or [[half-elves]], with the majority being [[green elves]].
document_data.Abilities:
Their survival skills in the wild rivaled those of [[ranger]]s.

In addition to their normal [[spell]]s, lone wolves could cast ''[[entangle]]'', ''[[pass without trace]]'', ''[[blur]]'', ''[[obscurement]]'', ''[[barkskin]]'', ''[[spike growth]]'', ''[[tree shape]]'', ''[[plant door]]'', ''[[hallucinatory forest]]'', ''[[charm monster]]'', ''[[commune with nature]]'', ''[[wall of thorns]]'', ''[[transport via plants]]'', ''[[creeping doom]]'', and ''[[acid storm]]'' once per day.
document_data.Possessions: Lone wolves used a variety of weaponry including [[blowgun]]s, [[club]]s, [[dagger]]s, [[dart]]s, [[hand axe]]s, [[knives]], [[sling]]s, [[quarterstaves]], [[short bow]]s, and [[staff-sling]]s. For [[armor]], they wore [[leather armor]] or [[hide armor]] and some carried a wooden [[shield]].
